summary: Come and get your New 47 Potions Witch Extends list of potions in game .
descriptionHtml:
New 47 Potions Witch Extends list of potions in game .

Are There Going To Be Comparability issues ?
I don\'t think sow it\'s esp file based and there should be any problems . 

Why i did made this mod ?
Well i was thinking why not should make them because i was feeling something is missing :)

Where I can buy These potions ?
The Mortar and Pestle :: Dawnstar
Grave Concoctions :: Falkreath
The Hag\'s Cure :: Markarth
Thaumaturgist\'s Hut :: Morthal
Elgrim\'s Elixirs  :: Riften
Riverwood Trader :: Riverwood
Angeline\'s Aromatics  :: Solitude
Arcadia\'s Cauldron :: Whiterun
The White Phial :: Windhelm
Birna\'s Oddments :: Winterhold

What\'s with balance with price\'s ?
Well i was working on this pricing are very well balanced.

What about potion them self ?
They are balanced with small math system .

I encounter problems or issues what to do ?
report them i will try them to solve as soon is possible .
author: glock9mm
